duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform maintenance and alteration tasks on civil aviation articles in accordance with technical data provided.
Assemble and test fuel controls, governors, and fuel, oil, and air accessories.
Utilize hand and specialty tools for precision measurements.
Read and interpret technical data and drawings.
Operate test equipment to ensure component function test passes.
Verify components are tested to appropriate specifications for airworthiness.
Troubleshoot and determine root cause of component failures.
Generate data plates for components using a laser system.
Document maintenance records of repair work orders performed.
Maintain an orderly and productive work environment.
Ability to function in a fast-paced environment while maintaining high quality.

education_certification.credential: High mechanical aptitude required. 1-4 years of aviation accessory experience required.
